description: Sixty thousand cases in 24 hours bring the total number to 1.7 million since the pandemic began.
title: Coronavirus: France records more than 60,000 cases
title_page: Coronavirus: France records more than 60,000 cases - BBC News
maintext: Under the lockdown restrictions, expected to be in place until 1 December, people can only leave their homes to go to work (if they cannot work from home), to buy essential goods, seek medical help or to exercise for one hour a day.
